sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Great Turkes letter, sent vnto the Prince of Transilvania. Containing many impious, and unheard of blasphemies, against our saviour Christ, and fearefull threatnings against all Christendome. Translated out of the French copy printed at Paris. And re-printed here according to order. İbrahim, Sultan of the Turks, 1615-1648.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by T. Forcet, London, : 1645.
The Great Turke = Sultan Ibrahim. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 8th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The Great Turkes letter, sent vnto the Prince of Transilvania. Containing many impious, and unheard of blasphemies, against our saviour Christ, and fearefull threatnings against all Christendome. Translated out of the French copy printed at Paris. And re-printed here according to order. İbrahim, Sultan of the Turks, 1615-1648.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by T. Forcet, London, : 1645.
The Great Turke = Sultan Ibrahim. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 8th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
T. Forcet
>>>>>>> imprintparse
